text: AHAHAHA me and my sis personality are total opposite she extrovert  I'm introvert
Which brand pineapple tarts u all find nicest ah?
Tbh I'm just there at ppl house to eat and get ang pow
Actually to me almost all about the same 😅
Isit?? Ok if I pass by I take alook
Nowadays all less oil less sugar
Less oil like less butter? Then won't do nice 😅🤣
Want ask my mum make ngor hiang
Scallop I saw NTUC got offer
My sis said ntuc 1 not bad
Wait till she has argument with sis
Oooo my mum making them soon
My mum cooks well but just too scary
Eg if got 4 people  she can cook 4  5 dish + 1 soup
It's all fun and games until she ask me to help out 😂
Her prawn noodles also nice 😍
Make egg roll is a pain.. she last time ask us help roll but we always roll halfway it harden already 🤣 back when we were kids
Mum cook anything also will say is nice lol😂
That cny shrimp wrap in popiah skin thing
We rolled whole days n nights for don't know how many weeks
I asked y roll so small. Don't cut the skin n roll a big 1 🤣
My mum not everything cook nice but also we die die must say nice.. say not nice back those days  we will be throw out of the house liao 🤣
Exactly  If say not nice u see next day dinner ur seat is empty no bowl and rice for u alr 😂
Sometimes she said u eat air can liao
but then ltr u eat too little or just bread then she will 心痛
My mum won't.. she will be there like "or bi good lor"
Me n uncle usually 1 soup or 2 dish
need see my mum mood for that day liao
Pri sch days my mum already ask us learn to boil soup
Got once I boil forgot see time. Soup dry  pot also black liao 🤣
Lazy mah n nowadays at home cook won't cheaper also especially if less pax
But some ppl have high expectations for food lol. To me sometimes I tell my mum u give me rice and fried egg is good enough
Luncheon meat cut thinner n air fry also crispy n nice
Actually hor.. fried rice pour potato soup into it is nice. Lol.. ok I know it sounds weird
if it taste good no complains 😂
Take a day leave  go early
Go in for breakfast n shop n come back after that
Actually hk design for this nicer than the rest. Cause I don't like too many prints. 🙈
I have to go out today
Cause uncle certified full of shit
😢 staying at home is dangerous
I might die of toxic gas
Ya was hot now a bit like going rain or whatever
and I literally just went and shit
N I bring packs of quail eggs to empress cause she can't find in ntuc at her place 😂
These eggs travelled half of sg
Y u think I'm awake so early 😅
For whole family gathering on reunion night
Actually I want eat also ask her add to herbal soup etc 🤣
Sometimes i don't understand why some parents like to bring newborn children to holiday.
